item.title: In-depth Analysis of the CAP Theorem: Building High-Concurrency and Highly Available Distributed Systems
item.author: davidzhang20001112@gmail.com (David (Ziyuan) Zhang)
item.description: Discussing the application of the CAP theorem in distributed systems from theory to practice.
